byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Harvey Golub, the former chief executive of American Express, will help the boutique investment bank revamp its operations.
snippet: Harvey Golub, the former chief executive of American Express, will help the boutique investment bank revamp its operations.

headline.main: Miller Buckfire Plans to Name Golub Its Chairman
headline.print_headline: Miller Buckfire Expected to Name Chairman
